category: BFA-PAINTING Curriculum - College of Architecture and Fine Arts
topic: Bachelor of Fine Arts (Major in Painting)
content:
Comprehensive curriculum for the Bachelor of Fine Arts (Major in Painting) under the College of Architecture and Fine Arts (CAFA) at the Eulogio "Amang" Rodriguez Institute of Science and Technology (EARIST). 

**Metadata:**
* Effectivity: June 2018
* Total Units: 180

**FIRST YEAR**
**First Semester:**
* DRAWING1: Drawing I (3 units).
* GEKOMFIL: Kontekstwalisadong Komunikasyon sa Filipino (3 units).
* GEPEMOVE: Movement Enhancement (2 units).
* GEPURCO: Purposive Communication (3 units).
* HISTWART: History of World Arts (3 units).
* MATRALS1: Materials I (Modeling 1) (3 units).
* NSTPROG1: National Service Training Program 1 (3 units).
* TECHNOS1: Techniques I (Freehand Drawing 1) (3 units).
* VISPERC1: Visual Perception 1 (Elements of Visual Arts) (3 units).

**Second Semester:**
* DRAFTPER: Drafting and Perspective (3 units).
* DRAWING2: Drawing II (3 units).
* GEMATHMW: Mathematics in the Modern World (3 units).
* GEPANIPI: Panitikan sa Pilipinas / Philippine Literature (3 units).
* GEPEFTE: Fitness Exercises (2 units).
* MATRALS2: Materials II (Modeling 2) (3 units).
* NSTPROG2: National Service Training Program 2 (3 units).
* TECHNOS2: Techniques II (Freehand Drawing 2) (3 units).
* VISPERC2: Visual Perception 2 (Concept of Visual Org.) (3 units).

**SECOND YEAR**
**First Semester:**
* GEELECGS: Gender and Society (3 units).
* GEELECIT: Living in Information Technology Era (3 units).
* GEPEHEF1: Physical Activity Towards Health and Fitness 1 (2 units).
* GESINEPP: Sinesosyedad/Pelikulang Panlipunan (3 units).
* GEUNDETS: Understanding the Self (3 units).
* MATRALS3: Materials III (Concept, Techniques, Process) (3 units).
* TECHNQS3: Techniques III (Color and Form 1) (3 units).
* VISSTUD1: Visual Studies 1 (Composition 1) (3 units).

**Second Semester:**
* GEARTAPP: Art Appreciation (3 units).
* GEELECCP: Communicative Proficiency in Business Correspondence and Research Writing (3 units).
* GEETHICS: Ethics (3 units).
* GEMATHMW: Mathematics in the Modern World (3 units).
* GEPEHEF2: Physical Activity Towards Health and Fitness II (2 units).
* MATRALS4: Materials IV (Continuation of Materials III) (3 units).
* ORIEARTS: Oriental Arts (3 units).
* TECHNQS4: Techniques IV (Color and Form 2) (3 units).
* VISSTUD2: Visual Studies 2 (Composition 2) (3 units).

**THIRD YEAR**
**First Semester:**
* ADVISTU1: Advanced Visual Studies 1 (Advanced Composition 1) (3 units).
* ARTTHEO1: Art Theory 1 (3 units).
* ARTWORK1: Art Workshop 1 (Adobe Photoshop) (3 units).
* BTAPHOTO: Basic to Advance Photography (3 units).
* GECONTWO: The Contemporary World (3 units).
* GEREADPH: Readings in Philippine History (3 units).
* PAINTING1: Painting 1 (Exploration and Analysis of Concept in Painting) (3 units).
* PHILARTS: Philippine Art (3 units).

**Second Semester:**
* ADVISTU2: Advanced Visual Studies 2 (Advanced Composition 2) (3 units).
* ARTTHEO2: Art Theory 2 (3 units).
* ARTWORK2: Art Workshop 1 (Corel Draw) (3 units).
* FASHDES: Costume & Fashion Design (3 units).
* GACULHER: Gallery Visit and Cultural Heritage Tour (3 units).
* GEELECDS: Practical Data Science (3 units).
* GESCIENTS: Science and Technology (3 units).
* PAINTING2: Painting 2 (Portfolio Presentation) (3 units).

**Summer:**
* COOPEDUC: Cooperative Education (200 hours)/On-the-Job Training (3 units).

**FOURTH YEAR**
**First Semester:**
* ARTSEMR1: Art Seminar 1 (Art Issues 1) (3 units).
* ARTWORK3: Art Work 3 (Print Art) (3 units).
* GEELECES: Environmental Science (3 units).
* RESMETAR: Research Methods in the Arts (5 units).

**Second Semester:**
* ARTSEMR2: Art Seminar 2 (Art Issues) (3 units).
* ARTWORK4: Art Workshop 4 (Installation Art and Mural Painting) (3 units).
* GELIFEWR: The Life and Works of Rizal (3 units).
* THESISPT: Thesis (5 units).

category: Curriculum - College of Arts and Sciences
topic: Bachelor of Science in Applied Physics
content:
Comprehensive curriculum for the Bachelor of Science in Applied Physics (BSAP) under the College of Arts and Sciences (CAS) at the Eulogio "Amang" Rodriguez Institute of Science and Technology (EARIST). 

**Metadata:**
* Effectivity: June 2018
* Total Units: 185

**FIRST YEAR**
**First Semester:**
* CPROGLAB: Logic Formulation and Introduction to Programming (C Language) Laboratory (1 unit).
* CPROGLEC: Logic Formulation and Introduction to Programming (C Language) Lec. (2 units).
* GEKOMFIL: Kontekstwalisadong Komunikasyon sa Filipino (3 units).
* GELIFEWR: The Life and Works of Rizal (3 units).
* GEMATHMW: Mathematics in the Modern World (3 units).
* GEPEMOVE: Movement Enhancement (2 units).
* GESCIETS: Science, Technology and Society (3 units).
* MATHANA1: Calculus 1 (5 units).
* NSTPCTS1: NSTP Civic Welfare Training Service 1 (0 units).
* NSTPROG1: National Service Training Program 1 (3 units).

**Second Semester:**
* ADVCPLAB: Computer Programming 1 (Advanced C) Laboratory (1 unit). Pre-req: CPROGLAB.
* ADVCPLEC: Computer Programming 1 (Advanced C) Lecture (2 units). Pre-req: CPROGLEC.
* GEFILDIS: Filipino sa Iba't ibang Disiplina (3 units).
* GEPEFITE: Fitness Exercises (2 units).
* GEPURPCO: Purposive Communication (3 units).
* GEUNDETS: Understanding the Self (3 units).
* MATHANA2: Calculus 2 (5 units). Pre-req: MATHANA1.
* NSTP-CWTS 2: NSTP Civic Welfare Training Service 2 (3 units).
* NSTP-LTS 2: NSTP Literacy Training Service 2 (3 units).
* NSTP-MTS_2: NSTP Military Training Service 2 (3 units).
* NSTPROG2: National Service Training Program 2 (3 units). Pre-req: NSTPROG1.
* PHYSLAB1: General Physics 1 (Mechanics) Laboratory (1 unit). Pre-req: MATHANA1.
* PHYSLEC1: General Physics 1 (Mechanics) Lecture (3 units). Pre-req: MATHANA1.

**SECOND YEAR**
**First Semester:**
* COMETLAB: Computational Methods in Physics Laboratory (1 unit). Pre-req: PHYSLAB1.
* COMETLEC: Computational Methods in Physics Lecture (3 units). Pre-req: PHYSLEC1.
* DIFFEQUA: Differential Equations (3 units). Pre-req: MATHANA2.
* GEARTAPP: Art Appreciation (3 units).
* GECONTWO: The Contemporary World (3 units).
* GEELECOP: Communicative Proficiency in Business Correspondence and Research Writing (3 units).
* GEPEHEF1: Physical Activity Towards Health and Fitness 1 (2 units).
* PHYSLAB2: General Physics 2 (Oscillations, Waves and Thermodynamics) Laboratory (1 unit). Pre-req: PHYSLAB1.
* PHYSLEC2: General Physics 2 (Oscillations, Waves and Thermodynamics) Lecture (3 units). Pre-req: PHYSLEC1.
* VBSQLLAB: Computer Programming 2 (Visual Basic with SQL) Laboratory (1 unit). Pre-req: ADVCPLAB.
* VBSQLLEC: Computer Programming 2 (Visual Basic with SQL) Lecture (2 units). Pre-req: ADVCPLEC.

**Second Semester:**
* ACMPLAB1: Advanced Computational Methods in Physics 1 Laboratory (1 unit). Pre-req: COMETLAB.
* ACMPLEC1: Advanced Computational Methods in Physics 1 Lecture (2 units). Pre-req: COMETLEC.
* GEELECEM: The Entrepreneurial Mind (3 units).
* GEETHICS: Ethics (3 units).
* GEPEHEF2: Physical Activity Towards Health and Fitness II (2 units).
* GEREADPH: Readings in Philippine History (3 units).
* JAVAPLAB: Computer Programming 3 (Java Programming) Laboratory (1 unit). Pre-req: ADVCPLAB.
* JAVAPLEC: Computer Programming 3 (Java Programming) Lecture (2 units). Pre-req: ADVCPLEC.
* MATHPHY1: Mathematical Methods in Physics 1 (3 units). Pre-req: DIFFEQUA.
* PHYSLAB3: General Physics 3 (Electricity and Magnetism) Laboratory (1 unit). Pre-req: PHYSLAB1.
* PHYSLEC3: General Physics 3 (Electricity and Magnetism) Lecture (3 units). Pre-req: PHYSLEC1.

**THIRD YEAR**
**First Semester:**
* ACMPLAB2: Advanced Computational Methods in Physics 2 Laboratory (1 unit). Pre-req: ACMPLAB1.
* ACMPLEC2: Advanced Computational Methods in Physics 2 Lecture (2 units). Pre-req: ACMPLEC1.
* APFELEC1: Free Elective 1 (3 units).
* CLASMEC1: Classical Mechanics 1 (3 units). Pre-req: MATHANA2, PHYSLEC1.
* MATHPHY2: Mathematical Methods in Physics 2 (3 units). Pre-req: MATHPHY1.
* MCONTLAB: Microcontroller Programming Laboratory (1 unit). Pre-req: ADVCPLAB.
* MCONTLEC: Microcontroller Programming Lecture (2 units). Pre-req: ADVCPLEC.
* MDRNPHYS: Modern Physics (3 units). Pre-req: PHYSLEC3.
* OPTPHLAB: Optics and Photonics Laboratory (1 unit). Pre-req: PHYSLAB2.
* OPTPHLEC: Optics and Photonics Lecture (2 units). Pre-req: PHYSLEC2.

**Second Semester:**
* ADLABLAB: Advanced Lab (Laboratory) (1 unit).
* ADLABLEC: Advanced Lab (Lecture) (2 units).
* APFELEC2: Free Elective 2 (3 units).
* APTHESI1: Thesis 1 (Research Methodology) (3 units). Pre-req: 3rd Year Standing.
* BELECLAB: Basic Electronics Laboratory (1 unit). Pre-req: PHYSLAB3.
* BELECLEC: Basic Electronics Lecture (3 units). Pre-req: PHYSLEC3.
* CLASMEC2: Classical Mechanics 2 (3 units). Pre-req: CLASMEC1.
* ELECMAT1: Electromagnetic Theory 1 (3 units). Pre-req: DIFFEQUA.
* SOFDDLAB: Software Design and Documentation (Laboratory) (1 unit). Pre-req: VBSQLLAB.
* SOFDDLEC: Software Design and Documentation (Lecture) (2 units). Pre-req: VBSQLLEC.

**FOURTH YEAR**
**First Semester:**
* APTHESI2: Thesis 2 (Experimentation) (3 units). Pre-req: APTHESI1.
* ELECMAT2: Electromagnetic Theory 2 (3 units). Pre-req: ELECMAT1.
* GEELECES: Environmental Science (3 units).
* GEPANIPI: Panitikan sa Pilipinas / Philippine Literature (3 units).
* PHYSEDUC: Physics Education (3 units).
* QUANMECH: Quantum Mechanics (3 units). Pre-req: MDRNPHYS, MATHPHY2.
* SOLIDSTA: Solid State Physics (3 units). Pre-req: MATHPHY2.
* STATMECH: Statistical Mechanics (3 units). Pre-req: DIFFEQUA, PHYSLEC2.

**Second Semester:**
* APINTERN: Practicum/Internship (9 units). Pre-req: 4th Year Standing.

category: Curriculum - College of Architecture and Fine Arts
topic: Bachelor of Science in Architecture
content:
Comprehensive curriculum for the Bachelor of Science in Architecture (BS Arch) under the College of Architecture and Fine Arts (CAFA) at the Eulogio "Amang" Rodriguez Institute of Science and Technology (EARIST). 

**Metadata:**
* Effectivity: June 2018
* Total Units: 214

**FIRST YEAR**
**First Semester:**
* ARDES111: Architectural Design 1 - Introduction to Design (2 units).
* ARGRAPH1: Architectural Visual Communication 1 - Graphics 1 (3 units).
* ARHISTO1: History of Architecture 1 (2 units).
* ARTHEOR1: Theory of Architecture 1 (2 units).
* ARVITEC1: Architectural Visual Communication 2 - Visual Techniques 1 (2 units).
* GEKOMFIL: Kontekstwalisadong Komunikasyon sa Filipino (3 units).
* GEMATHMW: Mathematics in the Modern World (3 units).
* GEPEMOVE: Movement Enhancement (2 units).
* NSTPROG1: National Service Training Program 1 (3 units).
* SOLMENSU: Solid Mensuration (2 units).

**Second Semester:**
* ARBTECH1: Building Technology 1 - Building Materials (3 units).
* ARDES122: Architectural Design 2 - Creative Design and Fundamentals (2 units). Pre-req: ARDES111, ARTHEOR1.
* ARGRAPH2: Architectural Visual Communication 3 - Graphics 2 (3 units). Pre-req: ARGRAPH1.
* ARINTERI: Architectural Interiors (2 units). Pre-req: ARTHEOR1.
* ARTHEOR2: Theory of Architecture 2 (2 units). Pre-req: ARTHEOR1.
* ARVITEC2: Architectural Visual Communication 4 - Visual Techniques 2 (2 units). Pre-req: ARVITEC1.
* CALCULUS: Differential and Integral Calculus (3 units). Pre-req: REMMCRAT (Mathematics for College Readiness 1).
* GEFILDIS: Filipino sa Iba't ibang Disiplina (3 units).
* GEPEFITE: Fitness Exercises (2 units). Pre-req: GEPEMOVE.
* NSTPROG2: National Service Training Program 2 (3 units). Pre-req: NSTPROG1.

**SECOND YEAR**
**First Semester:**
* ARBUTIL1: Building Utilities 1 Plumbing and Sanitary Systems (3 units).
* ARDES213: Architectural Design 3 - Creative Design in Architectural Interiors (3 units). Pre-req: ARDES122, ARTHEOR2, ARINTERI.
* ARHISTO2: History of Architecture 2 (2 units). Pre-req: ARHISTO1.
* ARTRODES: Tropical Design (2 units).
* ARVITEC3: Architectural Visual Communication 5 - Visual Techniques 3 (2 units). Pre-req: ARVITEC2.
* GEARTAPP: Art Appreciation (3 units).
* GECONTWO: The Contemporary World (3 units).
* GEPEHEF1: Physical Activity Towards Health and Fitness 1 (2 units). Pre-req: GEPEMOVE.
* GESCIETS: Science, Technology and Society (3 units).

**Second Semester:**
* ARBTECH2: Building Technology 2 - Construction Drawings in Wood, Steel and Concrete (1-Storey) (3 units). Pre-req: ARBTECH1, ARBUTIL1.
* ARDES224: Architectural Design 4 - Space Planning 1 (3 units). Pre-req: ARDES213.
* ARHISTO3: History of Architecture 3 (2 units). Pre-req: ARHISTO2.
* GEELECIT: Living in Information Technology Era (3 units).
* GEPEHEF2: Physical Activity Towards Health and Fitness II (2 units). Pre-req: GEPEFITE.
* GEPURPCO: Purposive Communication (3 units).
* GEREADPH: Readings in Philippine History (3 units).
* STRIGBOD: Statics of Rigid Bodies (3 units). Pre-req: REMMCRAT.
* SURVEYNG: Surveying (3 units). Pre-req: REMMCRAT.

**THIRD YEAR**
**First Semester:**
* ARBTECH3: Building Technology 3 - Construction Drawings in Wood, Steel and Concrete (2-Storey Residential Structures) (3 units). Pre-req: ARBTECH2, ARBUTIL1.
* ARBUTIL2: Building Utilities 2 - Electrical, Electronics and Mechanical Systems (3 units). Pre-req: ARBUTIL1.
* ARCADD11: Computer-Aided Design and Drafting for Architecture 1 (2 units). Pre-req: ARVITEC3.
* ARDES315: Architectural Design 5 - Space Planning 2 (4 units). Pre-req: ARDES224.
* ARHISTO4: History of Architecture 4 (2 units). Pre-req: ARHISTO3.
* GEELECCP: Communicative Proficiency in Business Correspondence and Research Writing (3 units).
* STROFMAT: Strength of Materials (3 units). Pre-req: STRIGBOD.

**Second Semester:**
* ARBTECH4: Building Technolgy 4 - Specification Writing and Quantity Surveying (3 units). Pre-req: ARBTECH3.
* ARBUTIL3: Building Utilities 3 - Acoustics and Lighting Systems (3 units). Pre-req: ARBUTIL2.
* ARCADD12: Computer-Aided Design and Drafting for Architecture 2/BIM (2 units). Pre-req: ARCADD11.
* ARDES326: Architectural Design 6 - Site Development, Planning and Landscaping (4 units). Pre-req: ARDES315.
* ARPLANN1: Planning 1 - Site Planning and Landscape Architecture (3 units). Pre-req: SURVEYNG, ARTRODES.
* ARPROPR1: Professional Practice 1 - Laws Affecting the Practice of Architecture (3 units).
* GEELECDS: Practical Data Science (3 units).
* STRUCTUR: Theory of Structures (3 units). Pre-req: STROFMAT.

**SUMMER**
* INDUSTRY: Industry Immersion (3 units). Pre-req: SURVEYNG, STROFMAT, STRIGBOD, SOLMENSU, REMMCRAT, CALCULUS, ARVITEC3, ARVITEC2, ARVITEC1, ARTRODES, ARTHEOR2.

**FOURTH YEAR**
**First Semester:**
* ARDES417: Architectural Design 7 - Community Architecture and Urban Design (5 units). Pre-req: ARDES326.
* ARBTECH5: Building Technology 5 - Alternative Building Construction Systems (3 units). Pre-req: ARBTECH3.
* ARPLANN2: Planning 2 - Fundamentals of Urban Design and Community Architecture (3 units). Pre-req: ARPLANN1.
* ARPROPR2: Professional Practice 2 - Administering the Regular Services of the Architect (3 units). Pre-req: ARPROPR1.
* STEELTIM: Steel and Timber Design (3 units). Pre-req: STRUCTUR.
* GELIFEWR: The Life and Works of Rizal (3 units).

**Second Semester:**
* ARRESMET: Research Method for Architecture (3 units).
* GEETHICS: Ethics (3 units).
* ARDES428: Architectural Design 8 - Design of Complex Structure (5 units). Pre-req: ARDES417.
* CONMGMT1: Specialization 1 - Construction Project Management (3 units).
* ARPLANN3: Planning 3 - Introduction to Urban and Regional Planning (3 units).
* ARPROPR3: Professional Practice 3 - Global Practice in the 21st Century (3 units).

**FIFTH YEAR**
**First Semester:**
* ARBMGMT1: Business Management and Application for Architecture 1 (3 units).
* STRUARCH: Architectural Structures (3 units).
* ARDES519: Architectural Design 9 - Thesis Research Writing (5 units).
* CONMGMT2: Specialization 2 - Construction Time Management (3 units).
* ARHOUSNG: Human Settlements and Housing (2 units).

**Second Semester:**
* CONMGMT3: Specialization 3 - Construction Resource Management (3 units).
* ARBMGMT2: Business Management and Application for Architecture 2 (3 units).
* GEUNDETS: Understanding the Self (3 units).
* ARDES520: Architectural Design 10 - Thesis Research Application (5 units).
